name: ss2rabi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))

stmt.origin: mprgbir(s0, c0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin: |- wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

comment: Inference of restricted abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1999.)
